title.content: We’re a collective of creative professional rebels

aim.roles: Creatives, Artists, Idea Makers, Choreographers, Dancers, Musicians, Technicians, Directors

message.content: who craft cosmic artistic experiences. From the first spark of an idea to the final cut, we handle it all
art direction performance tv shows/tours music videos audiovisual content concept creation concerts brand events community events stage design 3D animation

references.title: References
references.subTitle: We help brands that value originality, edge, and cultural impact create unforgettable experiences. The proof is in the results.

message.title: Feel inspired?
message.description: Let's chat, grab a coffee or exchange postcards and then do things together.

message.content: We are all different but connected by shared passion for things we love.

creative.title: Creative = the essence
creative.description: A concept that may seem familiar, but the process is like no other. It’s the surge of daring ideas that guide us to that irresistible rhythm of innovation and unforgettable experiences.

culture.title: Culture = the love
culture.description: Independent culture opens the space for change, a deeper sense of the world and society around. And we f*cking love it.

community.title: Community = the form
community.description: Our basic instinct is to be together. Wake up the potential and spark the talent among each other. Community gives space for creating magic across disciplines.

footer.socials: Wanna see what's fresh on the set?
